FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MXF-L1000 MXF-L1000] (06/06/2016), OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=1C:49:7B 1C:49:7B] ([[Gemtek]]) :Model: 3PJMVB001W (1x White), 3PJMVB003W (3x Kit White)
===Specifications=== * Product class: ''AC1300'' (400Mbps [2.4GHz] + 867Mbps [5GHz]) * Antennas: 4x internal high-gain antenna * Ports: USB: 1x ''USB 2.0'', Bluetooth 4.0 * Ethernet: 1x GbE WAN, 1x GbE LAN
